1370: Hadewigis moved to Davids hof.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Deghen at age 23 in 1370.
Gave birth to Eligius in 1370 at age 23.
1371: Gave birth to Trueb in 1371 at age 24.
1374: Gave birth to Jute in 1374 at age 27.
1376: Gave birth to Sylawert in 1376 at age 29.
1378: Lost son Trueb when Trueb was 8 years old.
1379: Gave birth to Salome in 1379 at age 32.
1380: Gave birth to Alwin in 1380 at age 33.
1382: Gave birth to Paradanus in 1382 at age 35.
1385: Lost son Alwin when Alwin was 6 years old.
